lines.name: Infractem
lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Limbsplit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 1 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Mj√∂lner

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger a Socketed Lightning Spell on Hit, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Socketed Lightning Spells have no Cost if Triggered

lines.flavourText: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

lines.name: Tidebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Endurance Charge on Melee Stun
10% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
(20-30)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
The sea strikes the rock relentlessly.
Whether in one day or in ten thousand years,
eventually the rock will crumble,
and the Brine King's domain will grow.

lines.name: Replica Iron Commander

explicitModifiers.text: Shrapnel Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Strength
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"Admittedly lacking the finesse of the fabled original,
Prototype #4 achieved identical results through brute force alone."

lines.name: Darkscorn

explicitModifiers.text: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
20% chance for Poisons inflicted with this Weapon to deal 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The Spirit of War knows nothing of good and evil.
It knows only destruction."
- Sekhema Asenath

lines.name: Witchhunter's Judgment

implicitModifiers.text: +22% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText: The pyre is never wasted on just one heretic.

lines.name: Void Battery

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Shimmeron

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-5) to (70-82) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (26-35) to (95-105) Lightning Damage to Spells
+(6-10)% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Power Charge
+0.3% Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge
+2% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge
Adds 3 to 9 Lightning Damage to Spells per Power Charge

200 Lightning Damage taken per second per Power Charge if
your Skills have dealt a Critical Strike Recently

lines.flavourText:
All at once, a calmness would encompass them,
and all at once, it would be torn away,
unveiling forms no sound mind could grasp.

lines.name: Replica Frostbreath

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon deal Double Damage to Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Three test subjects confirmed Prototype #495 creates an additional
debilitating effect from poisons. This could be very useful."

lines.name: Arakaali's Fang

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Trigger Level 1 Raise Spiders on Kill

lines.flavourText: All children must eat.

lines.name: Cospri's Malice

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger a Socketed Cold Spell on Melee Critical Strike, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds (40-60) to (90-110) Cold Damage to Spells
60% increased Critical Strike Chance against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Breathe deep, my child.
Let the frigid air engulf your soul.
Embrace the eternal cold, 
And it will embrace you back.

lines.name: Brain Rattler

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Enemies you Shock have 30% reduced Cast Speed
Enemies you Shock have 20% reduced Movement Speed
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText: The mind may have no limits, but the skull sure does.

lines.name: Nycta's Lantern
lines.flavourText:
Left in her tomb by the lynch mob, 
the flame inside still blazed bright after her death, 
and so did hers.

lines.name: Razor of the Seventh Sun

explicitModifiers.text: 30% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
100% increased Burning Damage if you've Ignited an Enemy Recently
Recover 1% of Life when you Ignite an Enemy
100% increased Melee Physical Damage against Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Quickly cooled the steel,
but never could it forget
the heat of the forge.

lines.name: The Supreme Truth
lines.flavourText:
Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

lines.name: Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%

lines.flavourText:
"Though ingenious instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

lines.name: Replica Tempestuous Steel

explicitModifiers.text: +(60-100)% to Critical Strike Multiplier with One Handed Melee Weapons
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate 30% Elemental Resistances
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Test subjects were unable to strike even a motionless target.
However, when a trained guard tried it..."

lines.name: Replica Bloodplay

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
(100-150)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Bleeding Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Prototype #131 must never be allowed near anyone who bears a wound, no
matter how slight. Even a tiny cut makes it exponentially more dangerous."

lines.name: Replica Last Resort

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life
200% increased Damage with Claws while on Low Life
Deal no Damage when not on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
"An absurdly vicious weapon in the hands of our test subjects. It seems to
channel the desperate will to live. Intriguing." 
- Researcher Olesya

lines.name: Replica Advancing Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Cast when Damage Taken
Adds 45 to 75 Fire Damage if you've Blocked Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Additional test subjects approved. Determine exactly how many wounds
need to be endured to activate Prototype #612's energies."

lines.name: Replica Heartbreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (40-80)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge
20% chance to Impale on Spell Hit

lines.flavourText:
"There is something incredibly satisfying about impaling test
subjects with Ethereal Knives. Perhaps it is the sound -
the spell, the screams, or both."  - Researcher Olesya

lines.name: Replica Allure

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: Gain +50 Life when you Taunt an Enemy
You gain Onslaught for 1 seconds on Killing Taunted Enemies
Enemies Taunted by you take 10% increased Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Test subject was able to survive the entire process simply by shouting epithets at
the researcher. Researcher's feelings were slightly injured." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Tulborn

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-29) to (42-47) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (120-140) to (150-170) Cold Damage to Spells
Gain a Power Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Cold Exposure you inflict applies an extra -12% to Cold Resistance
+(20-25) Mana gained on Killing a Frozen Enemy

lines.flavourText:
We remember the stillness.
Then the great fall.
The pain of separation.
We return once more.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Tul}

lines.name: Relic of the Pact

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strike Chance is Lucky while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Crush your enemies with your essence, so that you may drink of theirs.

lines.name: Iron Commander

explicitModifiers.text: Siege Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

lines.name: Replica Innsbury Edge

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
"The night-gaunts, they fly, soaring about in darkness beyond the ken of mankind.
I hear the silent whispers of their wings as they descend, for me, for me..." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: The Crimson Storm

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to Trigger Level 1 Blood Rage when you Kill an Enemy
+27% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
+(24-28)% to Physical Damage over Time Multiplier
+(24-28)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
50% chance to inflict Bleeding on Critical Strike with Attacks
Enemies you inflict Bleeding on grant (60-100)% increased Flask Charges
(36-40)% chance to deal Double Damage while Focused
(27-30)% increased Attack Speed while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
+(54-60)% Critical Strike Multiplier while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Adds (100-120) to (150-165) Physical Damage against Bleeding Enemies
50% chance to Maim Enemies on Critical Strike with Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"There were no survivors. It had only been fired twice."
- Order of the Djinn inscription

lines.name: Windripper

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Shocked Enemies
30% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText: It hunts; as silent as falling snow, as deadly as the tempest.

lines.name: Martyr of Innocence

implicitModifiers.text: +22% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(12-16)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
Damage Penetrates 15% of Fire Resistance if you have Blocked Recently
Immune to Freeze and Chill while Ignited

lines.flavourText:
You have been found guilty.
Let the fires cleanse you of your sins.

lines.name: Nebuloch

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
+4% to Chaos Resistance per Endurance Charge
1% reduced Elemental Damage taken from Hits per Endurance Charge
Adds 5 to 8 Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
200 Fire Damage taken per second per Endurance Charge if you've been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
They hoped that, trapped in its prison,
the creature would age and perish.
But time would not touch the fiend.

lines.name: Widowhail

explicitModifiers.text: (150-250)% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver

lines.flavourText:
"I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

lines.name: Ephemeral Edge

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have Added Maximum Lightning Damage equal to 20% of Player's Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
In the rift between future and past,
life passes quickly.

lines.name: Law of the Wilds

implicitModifiers.text: 1.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 25 Summon Spectral Wolf on Critical Strike with this Weapon

lines.flavourText: The strong survive. The strongest thrive.

lines.name: The Searing Touch

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-60)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
+2 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
Burn to cinders, scar and maim,
Rule a world, bathed in flame.

lines.name: Bitterdream

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Bonechill
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Hypothermia
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Cold Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Added Cold Damage
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Inspiration

lines.flavourText:
Fight not the cold
Forsake hope
Be still.

lines.name: Cerberus Limb

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Spell Damage Leeched as Life if Equipped Shield has at least 30% Chance to Block
+1 to Maximum Energy Shield per 5 Armour on Equipped Shield
+5 to Armour per 5 Evasion Rating on Equipped Shield
+20 to Evasion Rating per 5 Maximum Energy Shield on Equipped Shield

lines.flavourText: The greatest of guardians make the greatest of sacrifices.

lines.name: The Iron Mass

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers wield this Weapon while in your Main Hand

Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers deal Triple Damage with this
Weapon if you've Hit with this Weapon Recently

lines.flavourText: Lead by example.

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Frenzy Charges on reaching Maximum Frenzy Charges to make the next Bow Attack you perform fire that many additional Arrows
+(30-50)% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have a Frenzy Charge
(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.name: Jack, the Axe

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Thirst for Blood Skill
25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
+(25-35)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding from Hits with this Weapon

lines.flavourText: "More blood... hack open flesh... must drink..."

lines.name: Replica Tulfall

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-29) to (42-47) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Gain a Frenzy Charge on reaching Maximum Power Charges
(15-20)% increased Cold Damage per Frenzy Charge
50% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Hit a Frozen Enemy
Take 500 Cold Damage on reaching Maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Are we mad for attempting to build an engine out of this?
Looping cycles, power and pain..." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Story of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Hits with this Weapon Freeze Enemies as though dealing (150-200)% more Damage
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing (150-200)% more Damage
Ignites inflicted with this Weapon deal (50-75)% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
Through war we found peace. Through death we found advancement.
Our ancestors did not know where their actions would take them.
Are we any better?

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Fate}

lines.name: Kaom's Primacy

explicitModifiers.text: Every Rage also grants 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

lines.name: Xoph's Inception

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (200-300) Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Arrows deal 30 to 50 Added Fire Damage for each time they've Pierced

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph}

lines.name: Vulconus

explicitModifiers.text: 50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
(70-100)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Bleeding Enemies
(70-100)% increased Physical Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies
Every 8 seconds, gain Avatar of Fire for 4 seconds
(160-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance while you have Avatar of Fire
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire while you have Avatar of Fire
+2000 Armour while you do not have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
Lava bled from the earth and,
after a time, cooled and hardened.
The world protecting its beating heart 
with a thick, black scab.

lines.name: Beltimber Blade

explicitModifiers.text: Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles if you've used a Movement Skill Recently

lines.flavourText:
By wind and wing they are carried,
Their fates not theirs to control,
Yet the fates of others dragged in their wake.

lines.name: Tawhoa's Felling

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Tawhoa's Chosen when you Attack with
a Non-Vaal Slam or Strike Skill near an Enemy
(20-30)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
Strike with the might of a falling oak,
and know that you never stand alone.

lines.name: Hand of Thought and Motion

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Dexterity
5% increased Critical Strike Chance per 25 Intelligence

lines.name: Rebuke of the Vaal

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Though the Vaal revered peace, it would have 
been suicide for any culture to rouse them to war.
- Icius Perandus, Scholar to the Empire.

lines.name: Mon'tregul's Grasp

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced maximum number of Raised Zombies
Raised Zombies have +5000 to maximum Life
Raised Zombies have +(25-30)% to all Resistances
Enemies Killed by Zombies' Hits Explode, dealing 50% of their Life as Fire Damage
Raised Zombies deal (100-125)% more Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: With death as my ally, all the world is within my grasp.

lines.name: Slivertongue

explicitModifiers.text: (150-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance with arrows that Fork
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Forking
Arrows that Pierce have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier

lines.flavourText: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

lines.name: Severed in Sleep

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 60% chance to inflict Withered on Hit
Minions have +5% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Withered Debuff on Enemy

lines.name: Pillar of the Caged God

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt

lines.name: The Hidden Blade

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Unseen Strike every 0.5 seconds while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
The shadow warrior moves like the wind;
his strikes land long after he is gone.

lines.name: The Poet's Pen

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems per 25 Player Levels
Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Attack with this Weapon, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Adds 3 to 5 Physical Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 3 Player Levels

lines.flavourText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.

lines.name: The Whispering Ice

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Support Gems

lines.flavourText:
Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are
the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.

lines.name: Doon Cuebiyari

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Iron Will
1% increased Damage per 8 Strength when in Main Hand
1% increased Armour per 16 Strength when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
My Iron heart will beat when yours is rust. 
I take your Strength, your power, your lust. 
By Iron Will alone I set my mind in motion.
Through endless storms of fervent devotion.

lines.name: Reach of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Greater Volley
Arrows fired from the first firing points always Pierce
Arrows fired from the second firing points Fork
Arrows fired from the third firing points Return to you
Arrows fired from the fourth firing points Chain +2 times

lines.flavourText: We stand together. We strike together.

lines.name: Hezmana's Bloodlust

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
40% increased Attack Speed if you've taken a Savage Hit Recently
Attacks Cost Life instead of Mana

lines.flavourText: When a craving cannot be sated, any source will do.

lines.name: Replica Dreamfeather
lines.flavourText:
"Once we armoured the test subject heavily enough to test Prototype #502, he proceeded
to fight his way out. I don't know what we expected." 
- Researcher Graven

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: Twyzel

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire an additional Projectile

lines.flavourText:
Life persisted,
hardened, twisted.

lines.name: Apep's Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (90-130) to (140-190) Chaos Damage to Spells
Poisons you inflict deal Damage (30-50)% faster
Lose 40 Mana when you use a Skill

lines.flavourText:
Apep's poison entraps, encircles,
and engulfs the leaking mind of Man.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Flame

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 16 Molten Burst on Melee Hit
60% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The Karui savages claim the weapon was forged by their fire god.
I'm rather inclined to believe them."
- Fairgraves, Renowned Explorer

lines.name: Kitava's Feast

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 30 Melee Splash
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText:
Hinekora bound Kitava to a rock 
that Kitava could not lift with all his might.
Kitava vowed that when he broke free, 
he would devour every soul in Hinekora's domain.

lines.name: Augyre

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Every 16 seconds you gain Elemental Overload for 8 seconds
You have Resolute Technique while you do not have Elemental Overload
100% increased Physical Damage while you have Resolute Technique

lines.flavourText:
When the world spins out of control,
the safest place to be is in the centre.

lines.name: Rigwald's Command

explicitModifiers.text: +10% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Each Rage also grants +2% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding while wielding an Axe

lines.flavourText:
Fear not death. Turn to him, face him.
And smile as he sinks his teeth
into the throats of our oppressors.

lines.name: Cold Iron Point

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of all Physical Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: There is nothing more brutal than a simple blade wielded with rage.

lines.name: Chin Sol

explicitModifiers.text: 50% more Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range

lines.flavourText:
As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

lines.name: Death's Harp
lines.flavourText:
The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

lines.name: The Black Cane

explicitModifiers.text: Each Summoned Phantasm grants you Phantasmal Might

lines.flavourText: Lead the army of the damned from the front.

lines.name: Replica Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%

lines.flavourText: "The best place for this prototype would be in the hands of our enemies."

lines.name: Rigwald's Savagery

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Physical Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
+10 to Maximum Rage while wielding a Sword

lines.flavourText:
Tear the flesh from the bone. 
Turn the bone to dust.
Scatter the dust to the wind.

lines.name: Allure

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: You gain Phasing for 10 seconds on using a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText:
What drives us to kill, to carve and to shred?
What drives us to drink the seething souls of the dead?
What drives us to love and to hold, but still go amiss?
What drives us to leave this world for the Abyss?

lines.name: Doomfletch

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element

lines.flavourText:
"Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

lines.name: Dreamfeather

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 450 Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
She dances a dance beneath the shade,
The twilight shroud her only blade,
Who now hears her feathersteps flowing?
Beneath the stars, the moondrops glowing.

lines.name: The Grey Spire

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText:
There was never a simpler time.
Just simpler motivations.

lines.name: Death's Hand

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Stun
Gain Unholy Might for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
"All are welcome in Hinekora's eternal home." 
- Karui Proverb

lines.name: Iron Commander

explicitModifiers.text: Siege Ballista has +1 to maximum number of Summoned Totems per 200 Dexterity
Adds 1 to 3 Physical Damage to Attacks per 25 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
The Eternals commanded an army that need not eat, sleep, or breathe
without the usual depravities of necromancy.

lines.name: Replica Bitterdream

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Elemental Penetration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Immolate
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Unbound Ailments
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Ice Bite
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Inspiration
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Innervate

lines.flavourText:
"Attempt #2520: Been slaving away at this one for longer than I can remember.
Convinced this assignment is retribution from my superior..."

lines.name: Dyadus

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (255-285) to (300-330) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (255-285) to (300-330) Cold Damage in Off Hand
25% chance to Ignite when in Main Hand
100% increased Damage with Ignite inflicted on Chilled Enemies
Chill Enemies for 1 second on Hit with this Weapon when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Born of love, forged in blood
He burned as a torch in the blackest night
She shone as ice in the winter sun
Proudly, fiercely
At their mother's side, forever.

lines.name: Xirgil's Crank

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +15% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
+1 to Level of all Spell Skill Gems
Reflects 1 to 150 Lightning Damage to Melee Attackers
20% chance for Energy Shield Recharge to start when you Block

lines.flavourText:
"Since one with knowledge of machines
might be able to bring the labyrinth to a standstill, 
Izaro had us place many boobytrapped decoys.
But I know which switch brings the monster down."
- Xirgil, Trapbuilder's final words.

lines.name: Brutus' Lead Sprinkler

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 7 Fire Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"A sprinkle of liquid encouragement is often required 
to garnish the perfect confession." 
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Soulwrest

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Summon Phantasm Skill when you Consume a corpse
Minions deal (45-51) to (66-78) additional Physical Damage
If you Consumed a corpse Recently, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 5% of Life per second

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

lines.name: Cane of Kulemak

implicitModifiers.text: +22% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Support Gems
+(8-15)% to Quality of Socketed Support Gems
15% chance to Trigger Level 1 Blood Rage when you Kill an Enemy
+(70-91)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
+(70-91)% to Cold Damage over Time Multiplier
+(70-91)% to Physical Damage over Time Multiplier
+(70-91)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate (22-30)% Chaos Resistance
(57-76)% chance to deal Double Damage while Focused
Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate (22-30)% Elemental Resistances
(43-57)% increased Attack Speed while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
+(86-114)% Critical Strike Multiplier while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
Gain (14-19)% of Non-Chaos Damage as extra Chaos Damage
(33-47)% chance to Blind Enemies on hit
(24-28)% chance to gain Arcane Surge when you Kill an Enemy
Chaos Skills have (41-57)% increased Skill Effect Duration
(33-47)% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
(33-47)% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText: Stolen power is still power.

lines.name: Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge if an Attack Ignites an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Give yourself to the flames and your name
will burn in the minds of men forever.

lines.name: Grelwood Shank

explicitModifiers.text: Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles if you've been Hit Recently

lines.name: The Scourge

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Minion Damage also affect you at 150% of their value
Minions deal 70% increased Damage if you've Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
With increasing mastery over death
comes an increasing desire for it.

lines.name: Ahn's Might

explicitModifiers.text: +50% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have no Frenzy Charges
+(400-500) to Accuracy Rating while at Maximum Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Impossibly heavy, yet the ancient edge is as keen as any modern blade's.
A reminder that, in the end, when we lie in the bellies of worms,
it is what we make that makes us."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 47

lines.name: Replica Twyzel
lines.flavourText:
"Energy redirected is energy imbalanced.
Prototype #78 serves as a prime example."

lines.name: Advancing Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 12 Fortify
Reflects (71-90) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
"A man cowers behind his walls.
A woman carries her fortress with her.
In heart, in mind, in hand."
- Sekhema Deshret

lines.name: Agnerod North

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Agnerod West

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-15) to (100-140) Lightning Damage to Spells
+2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Hyaon's Fury

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Damage taken per Frenzy Charge
(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage per Frenzy Charge
20 Life gained on Kill per Frenzy Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Hyaon the 'Red Wolf'
Howling mad
Cloaked in blood
A banner to his legion
A terror to his foes."
- Garivaldi, Chronicler to the Empire

lines.name: Kaom's Primacy

explicitModifiers.text: Every Rage also grants 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

lines.name: Mightflay
lines.flavourText: A mighty beast, a lavish feast.

lines.name: Nuro's Harp

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy
Create Consecrated Ground when you Shatter an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Ornament of the East

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Dexterity Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Faster Attacks

lines.flavourText: To the Maraketh, death is as intimate as love.

lines.name: Quill Rain
lines.flavourText:
"The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."
- Rigwald of the Ezomytes

lines.name: Rive

implicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
2% increased Physical Damage Over Time per 10 Dexterity
30% Chance to cause Bleeding Enemies to Flee on hit

lines.flavourText:
Terror doesn't make you jump.
Terror makes you run.

lines.name: Replica Quill Rain

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Arrow Nova

lines.flavourText:
"How did you manage to lodge arrows in every single test subject
and researcher in Lab Three simultaneously?" 
- Doctor Bircus

lines.name: Piscator's Vigil

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have (100-115)% increased Elemental Damage
Damage with Weapons Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air. 
he sits, he waits, he watches. 
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river, 
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer

lines.name: Cameria's Maul

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
(30-40)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"You'll have my riches when you pry them
from my cold, dead hands!"
"That's how I prefer it."

lines.name: Debeon's Dirge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Warcried Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've Warcried Recently
Warcries Knock Back and Interrupt Enemies in a smaller Area

lines.flavourText:
A sharp and heavy beat,
discorded, out of tune,
when you hear it on the wind,
you know death will follow soon.

lines.name: Cybil's Paw

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (15-20) Life per Enemy Hit with Spells
8% increased Spell Damage per 5% Chance to Block Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
Tread lightly, lest their vigil find you.
Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

lines.name: Daresso's Passion

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
(60-80)% increased Damage while you have no Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
It doesn't matter how well the young swordsman trains.
All form and finesse are forgotten when blood first hits the ground.

lines.name: Infractem
lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Touch of Anguish

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing a Frozen Enemy
Skills Chain an additional time while at maximum Frenzy Charges
Critical Strikes do not inherently Freeze

lines.flavourText:
Grip the frozen steel, feel it numb you.
Wield the cold touch of death like 
a splinter of your own shattered heart.

lines.name: Realmshaper

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Cold to Fire

lines.flavourText:
"God's creations always begin and end
with flames and ice.
We should count ourselves lucky when we see neither."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: The Harvest

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level
Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Let it grow and gather inside them,
Let it flow through their veins.
Don't waste a drop.

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Lakishu's Blade

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 1 Multistrike

lines.flavourText:
"May the Blessed Lakishu watch our backs and our wives."
- Legionnaire Battle Blessing

lines.name: Kongor's Undying Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Command like a king and nothing will stand in your way.

lines.name: Moonbender's Wing

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 15 Lightning Warp on Hit with this Weapon
Hits with this Weapon gain (75-100)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold or Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the cold light of the moon,
the wing moves faster than the eye.

lines.name: Sire of Shards

implicitModifiers.text: +22% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems fire Projectiles in a circle

lines.flavourText: That which was broken may yet break.

lines.name: The Wasp Nest

explicitModifiers.text:
Attacks with this Weapon deal 80 to 120 added Chaos Damage against
Enemies affected by at least 5 Poisons

lines.flavourText:
To discover how cruel nature can be,
you need only shake the wrong branch.

lines.name: Eclipse Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: (120-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.

lines.name: Redbeak

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.

lines.name: Scaeva

explicitModifiers.text: 0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life per Red Socket
+10% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier per Green Socket
0.3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
8% increased Global Defences per White Socket
(60-80)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance when in Main Hand
+8% Chance to Block Attack Damage when in Off Hand

lines.flavourText:
Even from the back rows,
the whistling steel was mesmerising.
They watched the dance in the arena dust, silent as the dead.
A spell only broken by the spilling of blood.

lines.name: Shiversting

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
Stoic visage, icy heart.
Life of sorrow, lived apart.

lines.name: Heartbreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (40-80)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
A heart can be stabbed by thoughts, 
If your mind is sharp enough.

lines.name: Terminus Est

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy Charge on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
His final sensation was of the executioner's blade.
It was not cold, instead warm and reassuring,
murmuring a promise of better times ahead.
Smiling, he returned death's embrace.

lines.name: The Blood Reaper

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
To cease the flow of blood is to 
choke the rain in the very clouds.
Both life and land feel the thirst.

lines.name: Agnerod South

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Dying Breath

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 18% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills
18% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them
18% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills

lines.flavourText:
The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.

lines.name: White Wind

explicitModifiers.text: (100-200)% increased Cold Damage while your Off Hand is empty
+(30-40)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while your Off Hand is empty

lines.flavourText:
The Maraketh fear very little, 
but they dare not whisper the name
of the demon that flies on Winter's gales.

lines.name: Atziri's Rule

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Queen's Demand can Trigger Level 20 Flames of Judgement
Queen's Demand can Trigger Level 20 Storm of Judgement

lines.flavourText: Bow before her... or suffer the most gruelling death imaginable.

lines.name: Obliteration

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 20% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

lines.name: Agnerod East

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Lightning Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

lines.name: Jorrhast's Blacksteel

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 20 Animate Weapon on Kill
Weapons you Animate create an additional copy

lines.flavourText:
His flesh had long turned to dust,
but his vengeance lived on
in every scrap of iron he touched.

lines.name: Ichimonji

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Effect of Buffs on you
10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Allies' Aura Buffs do not affect you
Your Aura Buffs do not affect allies

lines.flavourText: Master yourself before you seek to master others.

lines.name: Midnight Bargain

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be used with Chaos Inoculation
+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
A chilling hush, a scraping sound
Of things no more entombed in ground.
A shambling horde is on its way
To crush the very light of day.

lines.name: Prismatic Eclipse

explicitModifiers.text: +8% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
25% increased Global Physical Damage with Weapons per Red Socket
12% increased Global Attack Speed per Green Socket
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana per Blue Socket
+0.2 metres to Melee Strike Range per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
"A raging Solaris seared and contorted the orb's surface. 
A despairing Lunaris filled the scars with her tears. 
Yet Viridi remained, trapped within, forever more."
 - Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Taproot

explicitModifiers.text: 0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Mana against Poisoned Enemies
0.5% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Maimed Enemies

lines.flavourText: Some things must die so that others can live.

lines.name: Femurs of the Saints

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
+1% Chance to Block Attack Damage per Summoned Skeleton
2% increased Attack and Cast Speed per Summoned Raging Spirit
Regenerate 0.6% of Life per second for each Raised Zombie
30% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Raised Spectre

lines.flavourText:
"They spent a lifetime in the service of God, 
only to spend eternity in the service of me." 
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Flesh-Eater

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
3% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Bleeding Enemies
30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
I suffer, I long, with thirst to slake.
Though countless corpses lie in wake.

lines.name: Innsbury Edge

explicitModifiers.text: 0.2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life
25% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Attacks with this Weapon Maim on hit

lines.flavourText:
A sword he brought, his foes to maim and rend,
from places dark behind forbidden doors,
but night by night he woke with frighten'd roars
from ghoulish dreams, too strange to comprehend.

lines.name: Queen's Decree

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: The Screaming Eagle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 2 Chance to Flee

lines.flavourText:
The eagle knows nothing
but the scream and the strike.

lines.name: Ungil's Gauche

explicitModifiers.text: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding

lines.flavourText:
Unwieldy and garish became graceful
and deadly in Ungil's nimble hands.

lines.name: Sinvicta's Mettle

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Area of Effect per 25 Rampage Kills
Gain a Frenzy Charge on every 50th Rampage Kill

lines.flavourText:
War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

lines.name: Serle's Masterwork

explicitModifiers.text: Can be Enchanted by a Kalguuran Runesmith
Can be Runesmithed as though it were all One Handed Melee Weapon Types

lines.flavourText: Truly great Artificers push the boundaries of the possible.

lines.name: Lavianga's Wisdom
lines.flavourText:
"The painful memories are the easiest to recall."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Taryn's Shiver

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of all Cold Spell Skill Gems
Enemies Frozen by you take 20% increased Damage

lines.flavourText:
Shed by the winged beast of night,
A scaly frost-encrusted thorn.
All who feel its wintry light
Shiver in pain at the frozen dawn.

lines.name: The Tempestuous Steel

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon Penetrate 30% Elemental Resistances
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain 15% of Physical Attack Damage as Extra Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
The blade thrums with wild energy
Eager for vengeance against all who walk free.

lines.name: Callinellus Malleus

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon
All Attack Damage Chills when you Stun

lines.flavourText:
To neither ebb nor flow,
but weather the rising tide,
outlast, unshifting and unshifted,
until the waters recede and we stand together.

lines.name: The Consuming Dark

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems
30% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Your Chaos Damage has 60% chance to Poison Enemies

lines.flavourText: The brightest flames cast the darkest shadows.

lines.name: Al Dhih

explicitModifiers.text: 3% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Enemies Taunted by your Warcries Explode on death, dealing 8% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage
Warcry Skills' Cooldown Time is 4 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"When the hyena howls thrice
death is sure to follow."
-Maraketh Wisdom

lines.name: Aurumvorax
lines.flavourText:
Many a collector of rarities discovered to his dismay
that the intelligent spirit in this sword
does not like to share its master's attention

lines.name: Moonsorrow

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 20 Blind
10% chance to Blind Enemies on hit

lines.flavourText:
Cast into darkness
And trapped for a thousand years,
The lonely moon weeps

lines.name: Widowmaker

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies that are on Full Life
1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Love only death
For she shall never let you go.

lines.name: Chober Chaber

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

lines.name: Hiltless

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Lifetap
Enemies you Attack Reflect 100 Physical Damage to you

lines.flavourText:
The cuts on my hands are a small price to pay
for the opportunity to drive my steel
beyond the flesh and into the demon's soul.

lines.name: Lifesprig

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Spell Gems
Regenerate (6-8) Life over 1 second when you Cast a Spell

lines.flavourText:
From the smallest seeds
To the tallest redwoods,
Life endures in Wraeclast.

lines.name: Limbsplit

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 1 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Quecholli

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Killed with Attack or Spell Hits Explode, dealing 10% of their Life as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The finest prosperity grows from the direst
carnage. Such is the nature of progress."
- Doryani of the Vaal

lines.name: Voltaxic Rift

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Lightning Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Hits with this Weapon Shock Enemies as though dealing 300% more Damage

lines.flavourText:
The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning
rained down. Metal withered and flesh melted before its
arcane power. There was no escape, no shelter. Only despair.

lines.name: Ewar's Mirage

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks Chain an additional time when in Main Hand
Attacks fire an additional Projectile when in Off Hand
(40-55)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
A single breeze blows
A hundred blades dance

lines.name: Hegemony's Era

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +6% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
10% chance to gain a Power Charge if you Knock an Enemy Back with Melee Damage

lines.flavourText:
The right to rule demands mental acuity,
a strong arm,
And a tenacious sense of justice.

lines.name: Singularity

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-10) to (150-200) Lightning Damage to Spells
Nearby Enemies are Hindered, with 25% reduced Movement Speed
100% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments against Hindered Enemies

lines.flavourText:
In time, all becomes nothing.
We just expedite the process.

lines.name: Voidhome

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText: Cursed is the star whence it came.

lines.name: Last Resort

explicitModifiers.text: 25% increased Attack Speed when on Low Life
100% increased Claw Physical Damage when on Low Life
100% increased Accuracy Rating when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Desperate times demand desperate measures.

lines.name: Mark of the Doubting Knight

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
50% chance to Cause Bleeding on Critical Strike
50% chance to Cause Poison on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Nothing is pure.
Slice open the Innocent
And spill a thousand Sins.

lines.name: Breath of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Skills have 40% increased Skill Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Breathe deep, and give yourself over to eternity.

lines.name: Fencoil

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 8 Trap

lines.flavourText:
You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen
- Old Ezomyte saying.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.name: Kondo's Pride

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Melee Damage against Bleeding Enemies
Cannot Leech Life from Critical Strikes
30% chance to Blind Enemies on Critical Strike
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Faintly gleaming in the moonlit night,
Kondo's Pride was primed to fight.
Driven by an inner fire,
bloodlust, spite and ill desire.
He swiftly moved to strike them all,
wreaking havoc like a steel squall.

lines.name: Ashcaller

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 10 Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
Adds (20-24) to (38-46) Fire Damage to Spells
10% chance to Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Dancing Dervish

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends

Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: Pillar of the Caged God

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt

lines.name: Frostbreath

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon deal Double Damage to Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A merciful murderer swept through the streets of Sarn
Robbing breath from the weak and worthless.

lines.name: Bloodplay

explicitModifiers.text: 30% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"I'm a painter, and crimson is my chosen hue."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

lines.name: Storm Cloud
lines.flavourText:
Centuries of development in steel armoursmithing
turned the armies of the Eternal Empire
into very effective lightning rods.

lines.name: Abberath's Horn

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (3-4) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (4-6) to (8-12) Fire Damage to Spells
Gain 10 Life per Ignited Enemy Killed

lines.flavourText:
The Goat King drank the smoke and ate the flames
as his ruin spread across the land.

lines.name: Axiom Perpetuum

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Fire Damage to Spells
Adds (2-3) to (5-6) Cold Damage to Spells
Adds 1 to (10-12) Lightning Damage to Spells

lines.flavourText: The worst of Axiom were imprisoned by more than iron.

lines.name: Brightbeak
lines.flavourText:
"I know how to say 'faster' and 'attack'
in Karui, Marak and Ezo."
- Voll of Thebrus

lines.name: Clayshaper

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 12 Summon Stone Golem Skill
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
Golems have (96-120) to (132-160) Added Attack Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

lines.name: Dreadarc

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Flammability on Hit

lines.flavourText:
The fastest way to a man's heart
is through his sternum.

lines.name: Edge of Madness

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Skill Gems
Adds 1 to 2 Physical Damage to Attacks per Level

lines.flavourText:
Soon, the pleas for mercy were muted.
Only one voice remained.
Laughing.

lines.name: Fidelitas' Spike

explicitModifiers.text: Herald of Thunder has 50% increased Buff Effect

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro was transformed by Raulo's love.
Thaumaturgy allowed Maligaro to return the favour.

lines.name: Gorebreaker
lines.flavourText:
Sure, there's many a hard man out there.
But this'll soften them up.

lines.name: Goredrill

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Attack Damage against Bleeding Enemies
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
A tap on the shoulder
A peck on the cheek
A sip of your wine
So red and so sleek

lines.name: Mortem Morsu

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold with this Weapon

lines.flavourText:
Fear blisters the heart and thins the blood.
Fear squeezes lungs and sets the guts to fester.
Fear is the wound left untended.

lines.name: Reaper's Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Accept your fate, or lie, pretend.
Death collects you in the end.

lines.name: Relentless Fury

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for 3 seconds on Culling Strike
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Onslaught

lines.flavourText:
Relentless fury
Sunder my every foe
Fuel my boiling blood

lines.name: Reverberation Rod

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Arcane Surge
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Spell Echo
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Controlled Destruction

lines.flavourText: If it's worth doing once, it's worth doing twice.

lines.name: Roth's Reach

explicitModifiers.text: (60-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: Silverbranch

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText:
"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

lines.name: The Blood Thorn

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
Reflects (22-44) Physical Damage to Attackers on Block
Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Block

lines.flavourText: Touch not the thorn, for only blood and pain await.

lines.name: The Goddess Bound

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
30% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
She paints her offer in wicked hues
An off-white grin, an elegant bruise.
To the nascent scourge she sings the ruse:
"With me in hand, what else need you use?"

lines.name: The Princess

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (25-30)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
"She's pretty, aye. So pretty you'll
want to be with her long after you're dead."

lines.name: The Stormheart

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 100% chance to Avoid being Shocked while Chilled

lines.flavourText:
When the storm comes,
the safest place to be is the centre.

lines.name: Wideswing

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Increased Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads 
of seven men in a single cleave.

lines.name: Wildslash

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Attack Speed with Movement Skills

lines.flavourText:
There are two things to know about fighting:
When to swing like crazy, and when to run.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-55)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Balefire
lines.flavourText:
After the fires swept down from the sky and swallowed the city,
all that lingered, as if locked in time,
was a memory of that which was gone, a whisper of deeds undone.

lines.name: Earendel's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeletons Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit
Summoned Skeletons take (15-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Summoned Skeletons have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
There the weary multitude of man-kind 
shall turn in their masses into the wide fire, 
where the destroying flame embraces the living, 
some will go up, some down, filled with misery.

lines.name: Sign of the Sin Eater

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies inflict Elemental Ailments on you instead of nearby Allies

lines.flavourText: A secret few among the Templars grant absolution by bearing the guilt of others.

lines.name: The Fulcrum

implicitModifiers.text: +25% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: (1-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire Damage
(1-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
(1-50)% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Elemental Ailments you inflict are Reflected to you
Elemental Damage with Hits is Lucky while you are Shocked
Damage Penetrates (8-10)% Elemental Resistances while you are Chilled
Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element while you are Ignited

lines.flavourText:
To stand at the confluence of the elements,
the master must achieve perfect balance.

lines.name: Goblinedge

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't gained a Frenzy Charge Recently
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance if you haven't gained a Power Charge Recently
+3 seconds to Duration of Frenzy and Power Charges on Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"That bronze girl sure knows how to cut someone down to size!"
- Bertrand the Plush

lines.name: Storm Prison

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.
